title: Login | OEC
text: Login OEC Dealer Portal Wasted time & idle inventory can add up to profit loss. OEC solutions simplify tasks into one central hub, so you can work faster & with more confidence. Log in to process sales, manage data, & get back to selling parts. OPSTrax Portal OPSTrax helps you increase efficiency for an improved bottom line. OEC makes parts procurement easier than ever with a streamlined workflow and user-friendly software interface. Log in to start selling more parts. PartsEye Login Log in to PartsEye to start creating optimized suggested stock orders based on your storeâ€™s actual sales demand and inventory. Plus, help ensure you have the right parts on-hand to support your customers! CollisionLink Now collision parts ordering is the easy part of your day. RepairLink Quickly submit, receive, process, & track parts orders online. PartsTech Login Access PartsTech to experience a connected, accurate, & efficient parts procurement platform. RepairLogic Start creating comprehensive repair plans using genuine OEM repair procedures. EstimateIQ Ready to capture complete collision repair estimates? Log in below. Trax Collision Shops Easily access upfront pricing, parts availability, & delivery insights for your collision parts orders. Collision Performance Network (US) Get access to your collision shop certifications, online tools, documentation, and more. (United States) Certified Collision Care (CAN) Get access to your collision shop certifications, online tools, documentation, and more. (Canada) Fleet Claims Site Log in here to access the claims site for Ford CSS and GM National Fleet Maintenance Program. Ford CSS (AutoIntegrate) Manage your maintenance authorization transactions quickly and securely. Speak to an expert today Reach out for more information, questions or comments about any of our products or services. Are you an existing customer looking for support? Click here.
